summary: Website that opens and plays shared video links.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal play-button icon on transparent background (play-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Abstract video/film themed hero illustration with warm neutral palette (video-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page UI where a user can paste a shared video link (URL) and open it in an in-page player.

Support playing common types of shared video links: (1) direct video file URLs (e.g., .mp4/.webm/.ogg) via an HTML5 <video> player, and (2) embeddable hosted video pages (e.g., YouTube/Vimeo-style links) via a safe iframe embed fallback.
Enable shareable playback via URL: encode the target video link into the browser URL (query param or route segment) so that opening a shared app link loads the same video automatically.
Add a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across the landing input view and the player view. Avoid a blue/purple primary palette.
Add generated static image assets and use them in the UI (stored under frontend/public/assets/generated).
